comments.content: [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062849/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/eurostile) (if Extended then have a look also to [Microgramma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062849/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/microgramma)), Italic or slanted, outlined and with a cutomized /T
